barista_record.MSG_TEXT: This task will export PAYER data for firm %1 to: [$0a$]%2 [$0a$]and Form 1099 vendor data for firm %1 to: [$0a$]%3 [$0a$] [$0a$]Existing files will be overwritten. Continue?[$0a$]

This task will roll Vendor Calendar YTD Summaries from the current to the prior year.[$0a$]You will not be able to print 1099 Forms for %1 after this task has been run.[$0a$]Do you want to continue ?[$0a$]
Company phone number is required. Use AP Report Parameter Maintenance to enter the number.[$0a$]
The current 1099 year is %1. Don't forget to close it.[$0a$]
Cannot delete Bank Account Code. There are ACH Payments in Check Register that have not been updated.[$0a$]
The ACH Effective Date cannot be a Saturday or Sunday.[$0a$]
Adjust the Discount Date for this invoice?[$0a$]
Invoice %1 distribution code's (%2) GL Cash Account (%3) must use in Bank Reconciliation[$0a$]the same Bank Account Code (%4) used by the selected Checking Account.[$0a$]
Credit Card ID %1 is currently in use for AP Invoice %2.[$0a$]It cannot be deleted, or marked Inactive, at this time.[$0a$]
The Credit Card ID must start with the letter "C".[$0a$]
Invoice %1 is already used by the credit card vendor %2 in the %3 table.[$0a$]
Cannot change ACH Payment Type while this vendor has ACH non-negotiable checks waiting to be updated.[$0a$]
Cannot change Payment Authorization parameters at this time.[$0a$]Invoices have already been selected for payment.[$0a$]
Please mount Accounts Payable Checks for %1. Click OK when ready.[$0a$]
Check number %1 was previously used.[$0a$]
Would you like to print the Payment Selection Report?[$0a$]
WARNING - Changing this setting will prevent access to current and historical invoice records.[$0a$]Consult with your dealer about the option to update the existing records to the new format.[$0a$]
Checks are currently printing for this firm. [$0a$]
This check has been printed, and cannot be deleted. Instead, it must be voided.[$0a$]
This Buyer/Vendor referenced in Inventory -- cannot delete.[$0a$]
Would you like to discard these ACH Settings?[$0a$]
Cannot delete this Distribution Code. It is currently used in the following tables: %1[$0a$]
This Invoice is already selected to be paid. Either select a different Invoice, or delete this row and modify the existing Invoice being paid.[$0a$]
The ACH Effective Date cannot be before the Check Date.[$0a$]
Password required to edit Purchase History.[$0a$]
Note -- this invoice is not in the Open Invoice file.[$0a$]
Exceeded maximum allowed images.[$0a$]
Invoice image uploaded successfully.[$0a$]
Mandatory data has not been entered, or the AP Type doesn't exist for the Vendor.[$0a$]This invoice cannot be saved.[$0a$]
Note -- this invoice has been fully paid.[$0a$]
Invoices were skipped and NOT paid with this checking account.[$0a$]See the Payment Selection Report for details. [$0a$]
Cannot pay an invoice that is on hold.[$0a$]
Invoice %1 is on hold and cannot be paid at this time.[$0a$]
Invoice %1 has already been entered for this check. It is already in the invoice detail grid.[$0a$]
Invoice %1 for vendor %2 is in use in Manual Check Entry for check %3, and will be skipped here.[$0a$]
This invoice is already in the %1 table.[$0a$]
Invoice not saved.[$0a$]
Invoice %1 is already being paid by a check currently in the computer Check Register.[$0a$]
Do you want to approve %1 for payment?[$0a$]
Do you want to mark %1 as reviewed and ready for further approvals?[$0a$]
Do you want to mark %1 as either reviewed and ready for further approvals (applies to new invoices), [$0a$]or approved for payment (applies to reviewed/approved invoices)?[$0a$]
Do you want to undo the %1 status of this invoice?[$0a$][$0a$]Click Yes to revert to the previous status, or No to cancel.[$0a$]
All zero balance invoices and related checks through %1 will be removed. [$0a$]Do you wish to proceed with this purge?[$0a$]
This invoice is on hold. Click Yes to pay it anyway, or No to cancel.[$0a$]
One or more invoices in the selection is on hold and will not be paid. To pay held invoices, select them individually.[$0a$]
Mandatory data has not been entered, or the AP Type doesn't exist for the Vendor.[$0a$]This record cannot be saved.[$0a$]
Invoices are being paid from multiple checking accounts.[$0a$]
Negative checks are not allowed.[$0a$]
Amount distributed to GL doesn't match invoice amount![$0a$]
Purchase Order Processing system must be installed to access this feature.[$0a$]
Cannot access replenishment information unless Inventory is installed.[$0a$]
Using GL Cash Account(s) not in Bank Reconciliation: %1[$0a$]
Using Bank Account Code(s) not for a checking account: %1[$0a$]
Current Invoice not fully distributed. Click Yes to update anyway, No to resume entry.[$0a$]
You can only view/select Open Invoices for a Manual Check, not for Reversals and/or Voids.[$0a$]
No invoice selected. Done with this task?[$0a$]
With the 'Print Checks in AP Type Sequence' parameter set, you[$0a$]are not allowed to select Invoices for more than one A/P Type.[$0a$]
You must enter an AP Type and Vendor ID before searching Open Invoices[$0a$]
Only one invoice per check is allowed for AP Type %1, Vendor %2.[$0a$]
This check is either a void or reversal. Would you like to re-use this check number?[$0a$]
Please set up the AP System Parameters before continuing.[$0a$]
%1 Would you like to send the notice email to the approvers?[$0a$]

Abandon your changes?[$0a$]If you close the form you will lose any changes you have made.[$0a$][$0a$]Click Yes to exit Payment Selection and abandon all of your changes.[$0a$]Click No to return to Payment Selection and exit via the green Run Process arrow when you are satisfied with your changes.[$0a$]

%1 is required for ACH payments.[$0a$]
Retain current invoice payment approvals?[$0a$]
